content: **knitted potholders with nordic pattern gingerbread cookies and hearts in drops muskat theme christmas ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ #gingerbreadlovepotholders drops design pattern r-853 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- **size** 1 potholder measures approx 17-18 cm x 17-18 cm **yarn** drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 08 off white 50 g colour 12 red 100 g colour 93 almond 1 potholder weighs approx 60 g **needles** drops circular needle size 3 mm length 40 cm **knitting gauge** 23 stitches in width and 32 row vertically in stocking stitch on needle size 3 = 10 x 10 cm note remember that needle size is only a suggestion if you have too many stitches on 10 cm switch to larger needles if you have too few stitches on 10 cm switch to smaller needles
